Html: Hi, I've just started using Naudio (I'm using it in Unity3d) and I've got some troubles on the file OggEncoder.cs  (downloaded from http://daisy.trac.cvsdude.com/urakawa-sdk/browser/trunk/csharp/audio/NAudio/FileFormats/Ogg/OggEncoder.cs?rev=1346). It gives me some compile errors and I've found that that file isn't in the latest release, so... Isn't it supported? Or there is another way to convert a wav file to ogg with Naudio libraries?
I'm afraid that class is no longer a supported part of NAudio. It was written a long time ago and never worked properly.

Understood :( I'm beating my head everywhere to find a way to do that in c# mono-compatible! Anyway thanks, I've got another question but I'll search a bit and ask that in another discussion eventually!
